Donald Hall

  1. Foster Name: Donald
  2. Alternate Foster Name: Koontz
  3. Foster Family: Charles and Isabelle Kunz
  4. Foster Family Alt: Koontz
  5. Location of Family: Wood River, NE
  6. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  7. Arrival Place: Aurora, NE
  8. Age on Arrival: 5
  9. Date of Birth: 1911-06-02, DeKalb, NY
  10. Date of Death: 1922-07-10, Wood River, NE
  11. Gender: male
  12. Notes: Died in a car accident.
  13. Source: OTR, 62; Hamilton County Register, 22 June 1917; Wood River Sunbeam, 13 July 1922; 1920 United States Federal Census; 1930 United States Federal Census; Interview of Mildred (Hall) Gloe.
